Review: Ok let me be honest, Dark souls 2 is not a bad game but at the same time it is not as good as I thought. Reason being the fact that before playing this game I've played Dark souls, which was a masterpiece(a complete package), like I still remeber that I wasn't able to forget about dark souls 1 for a week after I'd completed that game. Like seriously the day I ended that game I was completely empty, it was like I wanted more, I wanted to know more about the lore, the areas, the story behind all those characters, how did we end up in such a place and what not. I literally remember spending hours on research. And that was the best part about dark souls. Now when I played this game and completed it, I was like is this even a dark souls?! Like the story is not memorable, characters aren't intresting and the boss fights!! oh god, why were all those bosses so ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ easy?!! literally it just took me 30hrs (excluding the dlc's) to complete this game, and when you compare that to dark souls 1....dude I literally spent 100hrs on that game the boss battles in 1st game are actual hard and meorable and that's what makes dark souls what we know it for. Hard boss battles, finding joy through frustration and struggle and finding our way through the game. And all that is literally missing in this game, bosses are easy, you already know what you have to do in the game, you know where you have to travel....like it dosen't give players a chance to figure things out for themselves and the good part is that yeah compared to it's predecessor this game has improved on the gameplay, as dark sousls 1 was pretty slow placed game. And the last thing to hate is it's porting like the  Scholar of the First Sin version atleast should have had a better port!....They did the same with dark souls prepare to die edition (though it has been fixed in the remastered edition) and now dark souls 2, though it's not a major issue if you get used to the controls but yeah players who are new to the series.....it's often frustrating. My final verdict, the game is not bad but when you play a masterpiece like the dark souls 1 and then hop onto dark souls 2 for the same experience you are just disappointed.
Playtime: 31.2 hrs on record																					(30.8 hrs at review time)

The people who must have played older MGS game must be knowing what l mean to say. And yeah those who think that it was not good decision to make this game as the last MGS game in the franchise. For those l will suggest you to play the old MGS games then you will understand what is going on in this game and also you will get your answer. For me yes the ending of this game is the best ending for the METAL GEAR FRANCHISE. AND THANKS TO HIDEO KOJIMA FOR MAKING SUCH A GREAT FRANCHISE

Review: 𝕹𝖔 𝕾𝖕𝖔𝖎𝖑𝖊𝖗𝖘/𝕲𝖊𝖊𝖓 𝕾𝖕𝖔𝖎𝖑𝖊𝖗𝖘 I started play this game in 2019 but I regret... I regret why I didn't played on 2015 or at least 2016... I had no idea this game is not that hard... I really enjoyed even in Neutral Ending (KA Normal Playing). Before playing, I do not recommend to look any of the guides and videos 'bout Undertale, 'cuz I want to you have a good time with this story. If u ask me, I had a great time on my videogame life after a really long time. I am so happy for Undertale and its developer, Toby Fox. You must open the sound while playing, 'cuz this game has really good - best soundtrack. And my favourite thing is, old computers can run this game smoothly. That's because this game deserved 99/100 points. If you interested this game, play this game before check my profile. Congratulations Tob!

Review: I was played this game on old days and Rockstar Game Launcher (actually, this version is same as Rockstar Game Launcher), and I can say it will bring back your old days BUT, yeah I said but 'cause the new version is full of glitches and problems and this is a huge problem for Grand Theft Auto and Rockstar lovers. This game is not one of the games that you can install and play immediately. So, let's into the problems. Firstly, this game sometimes not detects mouse. That happens in old version but this version has much more. Trying to fix is a bit of challenging but it can be fixed. After mouse is working, there is a problem too. The FPS Limit is a problem for gaming (Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas designed for consoles, it's because much problem on high FPSs). If you want to play stable, then you must open the FPS Limit (it limites to 25 fps) and it is really bad situation if you have gaming pc to play games (it happens in old versions, too but in this version it is much worse). Then the graphical problems we have. In version 1.00, the vehicles bodies could be clean but after 1.01, vehicles dirty everytime, and it still exist in the new Steam version. I hope Rockstar fix all these and everybody doesn't need downgrade their games. The story is really great I recommend that. Peace!
Playtime: 0.8 hrs on record																					(0.7 hrs at review time)
